entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 5.5°C

Temperature: 5.5°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 44 %
Dewpoint: -5.8°C

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 24 March 2023
